newsitem.title: USA: CME May pork bellies limit down, others fall.
newsitem.headline: CME May pork bellies limit down, others fall.

text.p: CME May pork bellies tumbled the 3.000-cent-per lb daily limit and other months were sharply lower as the market turned technically weak, traders said.
May fell to 90.750 cents and other months were down 2.550 to 2.100 cent with July recovering somewhat to trade 2.100 lower at 92.050 cents.
Further technical pressure and lack of buying interest despite recent strength in cash bellies weighed on the market, traders said.
